title: googleadsaccounts
author: googleadsaccounts
content: Am selling $2500 OPEN AI accounts (legit ones ,no hack,fraud etc) for $350 .Monthly spending limit on these accounts are between $1000 and $1400 .Accepting   BTC,LTC,USDTBecause of the high demand delivery takes 48-72h after purchase.Escrow accepted as long as its someone known from bitcointalk offering escrow service for a longer time and you pay the feeSend me a PM if you are interrestedDISCOUNT$50 refund for a HONEST review of product after purchaseThread is unmoderated so no comments can get deleted.
